title: Kuuchuu Teien
description: This is Sahaquel, a beautiful country surrounded by the blue vast sea, where the south wind blows softly on your cheek throughout the year. One day, Aisha, who worked in the red-light district, was bought out by Karim, the only son of the Elhazard family, a rich merchant family. However, after being bought, no role was given to Aisha, not even the role of Karim's lover, which is what he was supposed to be. Despite being confused by this turn of events, Aisha vowed to devote his everything for Karim's sake…

matches.title: Ao no Exorcist - Naorazu no Koi (Doujinshi)
